provider.name: Lebara Móvil
provider.description: Obtains balance on Lebara Mobile account (Spain). Gets data via MyLebara: https://mobile.lebara.com/es/es/login.
provider.instruction:
First Time you Login to MyLebara:

Login: Enter the Lebara Móvil number (9 digits) you want to sign up on MyLebara

Password: Use the PUK code stated on the back of your SIM pack

Important:

* When you log in for the first time, if you did not receive the validation e-mail, you can resubmit it by login your chosen e-mail and password.

* Before login to MyLebara, you should have activated your Lebara SIM by registering in a Lebara Movil's authorized point of sale. Find more information on how to register by clicking here
provider.author: AnyBalance Team <info@anybalance.ru>
